TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Paga, title = Paga, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paga} }

S.FORM: Paga ksun o snalu dha sida qhuni apa dha mdngu qhuni thuun dha misan plahan. Sungu dha mhapuy uqun, 2 ka wahaw paga nii o tnunan dha nuqih psaun dha hirang, kiya do snaw ka mduuy paga, Mapa qhuni. Kingal duri ka paga ksun o kngkingal phdagan dha nengalan uqun pdngu brah sapah Truku sbiyaw, pniqan dha 4 papak qhuni ni spgan dha djima ka kraga na.aaji na tucing ka pnhdgan.

Paga kson o snalo dha sida qhoni apa dha mdngo qhoni thoon dha misan plahan. Songo dha mhapoy oqon, 2 ka wahaw paga nii o tnonan dha noqih psaon dha hirang, kiya do snaw ka mdooy paga, Mapa qhoni. Kingal dori ka paga kson o kngkingal phdagan dha nengalan oqon pdngo brah sapah Troko sbiyaw, pniqan dha 4 papak qhoni ni spgan dha djima ka kraga na.aaji na tocing ka pnhdgan.
